text:
Hey folks, as we ready HubDB for INBOUND, we noticed a few inconsistencies in how we were naming things. One was the use of the "choice" vs "select" column. We're standardizing on "select" with the individual items called "options". 

So "choice" column -> "select" column
"choice" -> "option"
We'll be releasing the change next week, but if you're using the JSON APIs or accessing "choices" directly from the hubl functions, you'll need to update your code.

<@U22PJPGK0|boulter> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/boulter/F2HRZ3X1T/eng-hubdbdocumentation-300916-0153-142.pdf|HubDB Documentation 1.4> and commented: Here's the latest documentation, reflecting the change from choice -> select.
<@U22PJPGK0> pinned â€™s File  to this channel.
